import React from "react"; import { Navbar, Nav, Form, FormControl, Button, Dropdown, Badge, } from "react-bootstrap"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { useAuth } from "../contexts/AuthContext"; import { useCart } from "../contexts/CartContext"; export default function TopNav() { const { currentUser, isAdmin, logout } = useAuth(); const { cartItems } = useCart(); return ( EcoMetrix
Inventory
{currentUser ? ( Hello, {currentUser.name}! {isAdmin ? ( <> Admin Menu Add Product ) : ( Account Details )} ) : null} {cartItems.length > 0 ? ( {cartItems.length <= 10 ? cartItems.length : `10+`} ) : null} {currentUser ? ( Logout ) : ( <> Register Login )}
); }
